LanguageData.StoneArrow.label: 돌 화살
LanguageData.StoneArrow.description: A sharpened stone is attached as an 화살 head. Cuts exposed tissue fairly well but is ineffective against any kind of armor.
LanguageData.MetallicArrow.label: 금속 화살
LanguageData.MetallicArrow.description: The 화살 head is made from steel to enhance armor penetration.
LanguageData.ExplosiveArrow.label: 폭발형 화살
LanguageData.ExplosiveArrow.description: Fitted with a explosive head to craft additional explosion damage.
LanguageData.BalistaBolt.label: 발리스타용 볼트
LanguageData.BalistaBolt.description: The 거치식 대형쇠뇌 bolt head is made from steel to enhance armor penetration.
LanguageData.StoneBall.label: 투석기용 탄환
LanguageData.StoneBall.description: A stone ball used for catapult.
LanguageData.ExplosiveBall.label: 투석기용 폭발 탄환
LanguageData.ExplosiveBall.description: An explosive ball used for catapult.
LanguageData.Poison.label: 독
LanguageData.Shock.label: 제압용
